00032 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::xmlLanguage(){
00033   LOGI("xmlLanguage creation");
00034 
00035   lastUsed="";
00036 
00037   Network::GlobalURI gu;
00038   this->filename=gu.getUserDirFile("languages.xml");
00039   doc=NULL;
00040   refresh();
00041 
00042   languageList=new tLanguageList();
00043 
00044   if (loadDocument()){
00045     loadLastUsed();
00046     loadDefault();
00047 
00048     LOGCATS("Last used language found : '");
00049     LOGCATS(lastUsed);
00050     LOGCATS("'");
00051     LOGCAT();
00052 
00053     LOGCATS("Default language found : '");
00054     LOGCATS(defaultLang);
00055     LOGCATS("'");
00056     LOGCAT();
00057 
00058     treatAllLanguages();
00059 
00060     LOGCATS("List size : ");
00061     LOGCATI(languageList->size());
00062     LOGCAT();
00063   }
00064   else{
00065     LOGE("Cannot load languages.xml");
00066 
00067     LOGCATS("languages.xml absolute filename : '");
00068     LOGCATS(filename.c_str());
00069     LOGCATS("'");
00070     LOGCAT();
00071 
00072     LOGCATS("TinyXml error description '");
00073     LOGCATS(doc->ErrorDesc());
00074     LOGCATS("'");
00075     LOGCAT();
00076   }
00077 
00078 }

00083 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::~xmlLanguage(){
00084   tLanguageList::const_iterator iter;
00085   // Iterate through list and output each element.
00086   for (iter=languageList->begin(); iter != languageList->end(); iter++){
00087     delete (*iter);
00088   }
00089 
00090   languageList->clear();
00091   delete languageList;
00092   languageList=NULL;
00093 }

00104 RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::getLanguageList(){
00105   return languageList;
00106 }

00116 
00117 }

00122 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::loadDocument(){
00123   LOGI("Loading language list");
00124   doc=new TiXmlDocument( this->filename.c_str() );
00125   bool ret=doc->LoadFile();
00126   root =doc->RootElement();
00127 
00128   return ret;
00129 }
00130 
00134 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::loadLastUsed(){
00135 
00136   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "LastUsed" );
00137   if (childNode){
00138     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00139     if (lu){
00140       lastUsed=lu->GetText();
00141     }
00142     else{
00143       lastUsed="";
00144     }
00145   }
00146   else{
00147     lastUsed="";
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00154 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::loadDefault(){
00155 
00156   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Default" );
00157   if (childNode){
00158     TiXmlElement* lu= childNode->ToElement();
00159     if (lu){
00160       defaultLang=lu->GetText();
00161     }
00162   }
00163 }
00164 
00168 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::treatAllLanguages(){
00169   TiXmlNode* childNode = root->FirstChild( "Language" );
00170   if (childNode){
00171     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00172     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00173       treatOneLanguage(child);
00174     }
00175   }
00176   else{
00177     LOGW("Empty snapshot list");
00178   }
00179 }
00180 
00188 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::treatOneLanguage(TiXmlElement* e){
00189   LanguageListItem lli;
00190   lli.setLanguageCode(getCommonCode(e));
00191   lli.setLanguageText(getCommonText(e));
00192 
00193   LOGCATS("code='");
00194   LOGCATS(lli.getLanguageCode());
00195   LOGCATS("' text='");
00196   LOGCATS(lli.getLanguageText());
00197   LOGCATS("'");
00198   LOGCAT();
00199 
00200   treatLanguageCountries(e, lli);
00201 }
00202 
00206 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::
00207 treatLanguageCountries(TiXmlElement* e, const LanguageListItem& it){
00208   TiXmlNode* childNode = e->FirstChild( "Country" );
00209   if (childNode){
00210     TiXmlElement* child= childNode->ToElement();
00211     for( child; child; child=child->NextSiblingElement() ){
00212       treatCountry(child, it);
00213     }
00214   }
00215   else{
00216     LOGW("Empty snapshot list");
00217   }
00218 }
00219 
00223 void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::
00224 treatCountry(TiXmlElement* e, const LanguageListItem& it){
00225   LanguageListItem* item=new LanguageListItem(it);
00226 
00227   item->setCountryCode(getCommonCode(e));
00228   item->setCountryText(getCommonText(e));
00229   item->setCompletePerCent(getCountryPerCent(e));
00230 
00231   // Test if this item is default
00232   if (strcmp(item->getLanguageCountry(), defaultLang)==0){
00233     item->setDefault(true);
00234   }
00235 
00236   // Test if this item is current
00237   if (strcmp(item->getLanguageCountry(), lastUsed)==0){
00238     item->setCurrent(true);
00239   }
00240 
00241   languageList->push_back(item);
00242 
00243   LOGI("Treating a country");
00244   LOGCATS("code='");
00245   LOGCATS(getCommonCode(e));
00246   LOGCATS("' text='");
00247   LOGCATS(getCommonText(e));
00248   LOGCATS("' percent='");
00249   LOGCATF(getCountryPerCent(e));
00250   LOGCATS("'%");
00251   LOGCAT();
00252 }

00257 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::getCommonCode(TiXmlElement* e){
00258   TiXmlNode* code=e->FirstChild( "Code" );
00259   if (code){
00260     TiXmlElement* elem=code->ToElement();
00261     if (elem){
00262       return elem->GetText();
00263     }
00264     else{
00265       return "Unset";
00266     }
00267   }
00268   else{
00269     return "Unset";
00270   }
00271 }
00272 
00276 const char* RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::getCommonText(TiXmlElement* e){
00277   TiXmlNode* code=e->FirstChild( "Text" );
00278   if (code){
00279     TiXmlElement* elem=code->ToElement();
00280     if (elem){
00281       return elem->GetText();
00282     }
00283     else{
00284       return "Unset";
00285     }
00286   }
00287   else{
00288     return "Unset";
00289   }
00290 }
00291 
00295 float RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::getCountryPerCent(TiXmlElement* e){
00296   TiXmlNode* code=e->FirstChild( "CompletePerCent" );
00297   if (code){
00298     TiXmlElement* elem=code->ToElement();
00299     if (elem){
00300       return StringConv::getSingleton().ctof(elem->GetText());
00301     }
00302     else{
00303       return 0;
00304     }
00305   }
00306   else{
00307     return 0;
00308   }
00309 }

00316 bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlLanguage::isLastUsedEmpty(){
00317   if (strcmp(lastUsed, "None")==0){
00318     return true;
00319   }
00320   else{
00321     return false;
00322   }
00323 }
